ygData.subject: RE: Runed Bone Fork (call for a spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: in upper guk, the squire if i  remember correctly. i camped that SOB so long and hadnt gotten a stupid fork, that and the troll belt. And as soon as i leave,
ygData.messageBody:
in upper guk, the squire if i remember correctly. i camped that SOB so long
and hadnt gotten a stupid fork, that and the troll belt. And as soon as i
leave, my buddies are running to do a corpse retrieval to lower guk and got
both the fork and belt (warden) for me. Talk about luck hehe.

and the other night i was coming back from lower guk and killed the squire
and he had a fork on him, did a shout to the zone of a free fork, sadly it
rotted away since i allready had one

Minkin
Sol ro
lev 36 questing fool

> From: Beatdrop Battledrum [SMTP:Beatdrop@...]

> Subject: [eqbards] Runed Bone Fork (call for a spoiler)
